11.title: Shrunken on a party

12.content:
School has ended and everyone is going on Holiday. Tim is at Tom and is sleeping their.
They both wished they could see the world in another aspect. So they did and the most unnatural has happened, they SHRUNK!!! The worst of it all they shrunk while a giantess is on vacation! This story is about survival, Enslavement and a small adventure in a Gigantic world. They are the same giantesses as in Shrunken in Class.

The vacations to choose are:

~Winter~

12.title: Shrunken on vacation

13.content: More story's are found here!
13.title: More....

14.content:
In this story you are either Tom or Tim and you work in an orginasation.
You work or in the Shrunken man Help Center(with the giantess: Cindy, Roxanne, Emmy and Tessel) or in World of Giantesses(with the giantess: Tessa, Melissa, Vera, Yvana, Amy, Thomara, Annissa and Rianna).
Your mission is depended by the orginasation.

If your a spy in the World of Giantess(WOG) organisation, your goal is easy.
-Find the growth machine, shrink it and take it.
--Find the key, to get the machine work.
---Try to shrink Amy DK, Roxanne, Cindy and Tezzy.
----Take them to your mistresses at the WOG
-----Try not to get caught

If your a spy in the Shrunken man help Center(SMHC), your goal is a bit harder.
-Find the HQ of the WoG Organisation.
--Try not to get captured.
---Find the Shrink machine
----Find the shrunk capsule
-----Try to know the secret plans of the WOG organisation
------Try to stop the giantess girls

There are also some other Giantess girls on the way towards your goal, the organisations are not next door from each other. It won't be an easy task for them, and It will be a very hard journey filled with peril.
---------------------------------------------------------------------------- ----
So lookout and choose your Organisation!
14.title: Shrunken Spies

15.content: There are more story's to follow.
15.title: More...

152.content: So, uhhh, the title says 'shrunken with a girl', does that mean a girl shrunk with one of the two? Or did they shrink in the presence of one? I'll put both in choices.
152.title: Title confusion

1522.content:
One day, while Tim was at a party with Tom and his girlfriend he's had for three years, Amber. Tim and Tom had have multiple dreams about shrinking in class, or in other situations. They were used to the dreams, but what they didn't expect is for those dreams to come true.
Amber is 6 years older than Tim, who, in this story, is 15, and 5 years older than Tom. She is a foot taller than the both of them, has D cup breasts, and a rounded butt. She has long, silky black hair. She is extremely smart and nice.
So, back to story, Tim and Amber separated from the main party group including Tom for a private moment. Amber recently moved into Tim's house and doesn't have a room yet, so she sleeps in the same room as Tim, so, like normal people at parties, they talked about future plans. Halfway through the conversation, Tim started to feel sick. "Tim? Are you okay?" Amber asks him, worried, "Yeah, I just, I just don... Fee......" He passes out on the floor.
When he wakes up, everything is huge, and all he sees is...
1522.title: Tim's Girlfriend

154.content:
Tim's and Tom's class need to do a Biology Project about the human body.
Tim invented a machine to make himself smaller along with Tom
Tim himself invented some stuff for their micro journey, including:
-Bug wings-this makes them fly, by a little propeller.
-Stuck shoes-This makes them able to stay their footing everywhere.
-A special Custom-This is equipped with the bug wings. This custom protects them against the many dangers(at least he hopes)
-And the shrink/growth ring-This ring makes them smaller or bigger in the size they want.

Now The characters are all the same as in Shrunken in Class and the story starts, but in which nose, mouth or ear would you go?
154.title: Shrunken Biology Project

info.description:
Which story is your story, follow Tim and Tom's adventures while they are on Vacation and on Party's. follow their adventure to survive at huge places of the world. Let them be spies and let them stop the World of Giantess club or the Shrunken Man Help Center! Let them struggle within the desserts and food in a restaurant. Make them flee for their lives as they run from thundering giantess steps as they wander in an amusement park. Make sure that they will get an A+ while micro sized and they explore the human body of a giantess! Let either Tom or Tim get shrunk, with a girl!


Everything is possbile, for Its not a small world after all, when your 1cm tall!
info.pretty_title: Shrunken in Class: Which story to follow
